Text: Even if it says there are no seeds, there probably are a few, and I have a fast connection.

if you'd like my personal opinion, id suggest a little larger filesize for such a long film (i prefer .24 bpp (bits per pixel) myself, as when watching on standalones "boxiness" is greatly reduced at that level.
I don't really think more colors (24 bits = 2^24colors) will reduce blockiness, only increasing the bitrate.
